price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߕߊߛߟߎ ߟߐ߬ ߊ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߊߝߟߌ߬ ߥߋ߲߯ߓߋ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
